title: RESETING/CLEARING KERNING
content: Can anybody please tell me how to clear all previous kerning in fontlab 5? thanks!
author: tedbreakmore

comments.content:
Nice post heading. Looks like a Western Livery Stable Display anno 1865.  
”Howdie pardner, let’s clear some of your kerns, or you will be sorry…”  
”Pardon my appearance, Sheriff, I forgot to reset this morning, truly sorry.”

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
